Version - 7.2

what's new? what's new? review the full release notes for the ops v7 2 featured videos featured videos watch the videos for some of the latest features released in version 7 2 product module canvas product intro canvas product intro create a canvas product with a great user experience and the right features additional options update additional options update arrange multiple additional options in a single row with image binding kit product enhancements kit product enhancements kit products will now be considered as a separate ‘product’ entity in ops shipping module package master configuration and more package master configuration and more create master packages enter package weight and import bulk packages flat shipping & user group wise shipping flat shipping & user group wise shipping create master packages, enter package weight & import packages third party (billing) shipping third party (billing) shipping now admin can directly bill the order receiver i e store or default store customers for shipping charges front store enhancements hover effect on menu link hover effect on menu link get various sub menu styles namely click, hover, and hover & redirection marketing landing pages marketing landing pages enable the marketing pages, set links, and use them in your email campaigns
